reviews.review_msg: Difficult class though both the instructors and TA were very accessible and cleared up my questions in office hours.  Lots of people didn't show up to lectures, don't expect this class to be easy if you aren't there. We repeated the exact problems on the exam at least three times throughout the term in homework and lectures.

Jumps into topics too quickly & doesn't give time for understanding & covers way to much material!yes it's uni, but this guy seems to think this is the only course u r taking. Assignments are absolutely over the top for a first year course! and I'm only in my 2nd semester. don't take a programming class with him.. seriously..don't. DON'T.you'll cry

If you wanna have a good sleep,enjoy your IAT life and a good GPA, then don't think about his course. He is talented,but definitly is not a good teacher. He makes many students hates programing. The assignments are so hard and you can't imagaine they are from a 100 level course.

Class was designed to be an intermediate programming course unfortunately the pre req for it focused on a totally different programming language leaving most students who didn't hobby program before hand clueless as to what was going on. It was confusing and hard to follow but he did make an effort to try to get us up to speed.
